title: Quartermaine title clash is the highlight of Cleary’s show
content:
Cleary’s Gym host their first show of the new season at The Assembly tomorrow night with six Central England Belt matches providing the highlight of a mouthwatering card. 

		 
Three feature Cleary’s fighters, with the main event an intriguing CEB Youth lightweight title match-up between champion Danny Quartermaine and Morgan Bosley (Far Cotton). 

Bosley campaigned at bantamweight for most of last season though he did win lightweight gold at the Haringey Box Cup in June. 

			 
Lewis Williams battles Tri-Nations champion Coree Clarke (Warley) for the vacant CEB Youth heavyweight title, while unbeaten CEB Novice middleweight champion Nathan Samuels (Merridale) makes the first defence of his belt against Cleary’s Liam Timms. 



 
Tickets cost £11 with doors opening at 7pm.
